newsitem.title: USA: Roche unit to sell Palo Alto operations.
newsitem.headline: Roche unit to sell Palo Alto operations.

text.p: Roche Holding Ltd said Thursday its Syntex subsidiary signed an agreement to sell its manufacturing and development operations in Palo Alto, California, to Oread Inc.
Financial terms were not disclosed, but the companies said Syntex would become a minority stockholder in Oread. The sale is expected to close in November.
Roche, based in Basel, Switzerland, is a research-based health care group.
Oread was formed in 1983 as a commercial outlet for technologies developed at Higuchi Biosciences Center for BioAnalytical Research.
